titleStmt.title: A briefe discourse of vvarre. VVritten by Sir Roger VVilliams Knight; vvith his opinion concerning some parts of the martiall discipline. Newly perused
titleStmt.author: Williams, Roger, Sir, 1540?-1595.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Orwin, dwelling in Paternoster Row, ouer against the signe of the Checker,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
